Discs#

class DiscsStateEstimation#

Perceive a fixed number of nearest neighbors and obstacles

Empty places are filled with zeros

Registered properties:

  • range (float, range)

  • number (int, number)

  • max_radius (int, number)

  • max_speed (int, number)

  • use_nearest_point (bool, use_nearest_point)

  • `max_

__init__(range: float = 1.0, number: int = 1, max_radius: float = 0, max_speed: float = 0, include_valid: bool = True, use_nearest_point: bool = True, max_id: int = 0) → None#

Constructs a new instance.

Parameters:

  • range – The range of view

  • number – Number of discs

property include_valid#
Type:

bool

Whether to include validity.

property max_id#
Type:

int

The maximal possible id.

property max_radius#
Type:

float

The maximal neighbor radius.

property max_speed#
Type:

float

The maximal neighbor speed.

property number#
Type:

int

The number of discs.

property range#
Type:

float

The range of view.

property use_nearest_point#
Type:

bool

Whether to use the nearest or the center as position
